snippet: Serena Williams needed less than an hour to dispatch second-seeded Samantha Stosur, 6-1, 6-1, to advance to the clay-court final.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams needed less than an hour to dispatch second-seeded Samantha Stosur, 6-1, 6-1, to advance to the clay-court final.

headline.seo: Serena Williams Overpowers Stosur to Advance to Family Circle Final
headline.main: Bryans Win in Davis Cup to Give U.S. a 2-1 Lead
headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Routs Stosur to Reach Final
